name: eles.toggleClass
descr: Toggle whether the elements have the specified classes.  The classes should be specified in the [stylesheet](#style) in order to have an effect on the rendered style of the elements.

args.name: classes
args.descr: An array (or a space-separated string) of class names to toggle on the elements.

args.name: toggle
args.descr: Instead of automatically toggling, adds the classes on truthy values or removes them on falsey values.
